title: Flight paths: how a passionate and quirky group of pioneering scientists solved the mystery of bird migration
content: Flight Paths: How A Passionate and Quirky Group of Pioneering Scientists Solved the Mystery of Bird Migration by HeismanRebecca. 2023. HarperCollins Publishers, New York, New York, USA. pp. $30.00 (hardcover). ISBN 978-0-06-316114-6.
